Articles.Content:
In the VAB, the center of mass and the center of thrust (with thrust vector) can be displayed, but there is no easy way, as far as I can tell, to display the resulting torque, other than trying to match up COM and COT visually and trying to guess the resulting torque. It would be nice if, when both COM and COT are toggled on, the torque vector relative to COM were displayed.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T10:01:05Z" title="05/18/2015 10:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by akruppa**
